resources.string:
This is a demonstration card, and will not be scored.
 
 Once the test begins, read each number on the card
 from left to right, top to bottom.
 Read the numbers out loud, as fast as you can.
 
 Tap anywhere on the screen to begin the test

This application is in no way able to diagnose concussions or other types of\n brain injury, but your score is significantly worse than your baseline score,\n and as such you should consult a medical professional without delay.

This application is in no way able to diagnose concussions or other types of
 brain injury. Your score is better than your baseline score, but that does not
 mean you do not have a medical condition. Seek medical attention if you suspect
 anything might be wrong.
The baseline threshold is based on your baseline tests.\n Any score higher than this is cause for seeking medical attention
